#include <iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long t,i;
    cin>>t;

    cin.ignore();
    //cout<<t;
    while(t--)
    {
        //cout<<"hi\n";
        string a;
        getline(cin,a);
        //cout<<a<<endl;
        //cout<<"hello"<<endl;
        long long x=0;
        for(i=0; i<a.length(); i++)
        {
            x=(int)(a[i]-'a');
            if(a[i]==' ')
            {
                printf("$");

            }
            else if(a[i]!=' '&& (a[i+1]!=' ')&&i!=a.length()-1)
                printf("%lld-",x*x);
            else
                printf("%lld",x*x);
            x++;
        }
        printf("\n");
    }
    return 0;

}
